newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela cat cracker out for eight days - trader.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela cat cracker out for eight days - trader.

text.p: A 55,000 barrel per day (bpd) catalytic cracker at Venezuela's 120,000 bpd El Palito refinery will be shut for eight days after a fault occurred on Friday, a Venezuelan trader said.
"There was a small crack and its going to be out of commission for eight days," the trader said.

"I think it's going to affect two cargoes of gasoline and one cargo of gas oil. They had a cargo of gas oil at the end of the month they cancelled and they are still working on the schedule for gasoline."
The refinery is operated by state oil subsidiary Corpoven, and is a major supplier of refined products to the United States.
A Corpoven spokesman said: "The company has no comment."
